text: What a DELIGHT! I wanted something sweet so I pulled up my go to application for restaurants, Yelp! This little hidden gem popped up first. I'll make what could be a long review about how much I LOVED this restaurant short. It was clean, the owner( I assume she was anyhow) was SUPER friendly, the options were plentiful and the food was SO GOOD! I ordered a waffle with vanilla icecream, strawberries, Nutella, chocolate and caramel. The waffle was hot and fluffy, the strawberries were fresh and the icecream was just sweet enough. I'm happy to add this restaurant to my list of favs! :)

Been here a few times with my kids, and each time we come here we are never disappointed. The Crepes here is sooooooo AMAZING! My favorite is definitely vanilla ice cream top with banana and some chocolate syrup on top. Besides the Crepes there frozen fruits are also delicious. The kids love coming here and ordering different things on the menu every week. Besides the yummy Dessert, the owners are also very nice people!

Best crepes in town! Portions are huge and the fruits are always fresh. My boyfriend and I have become regulars! We love getting mangos, strawberries, and bananas with vanilla ice cream!The owners are really nice and friendly as well!

I'm really glad I decided to come here for a sweet treat. I ordered a fruit crepe filled with fresh strawberries, blueberries and fresh whipped cream.  It was topped with strawberry syrup and powdered sugar. My husband ordered a banana, peanut butter and vanilla ice cream filled crepe topped with caramel and powdered sugar.  These crepes were delicious!  We will definitely be back to try some of their other crepes which is made to order.

My favorite guilty pleasure spot, without a doubt! That being said, I don't feel quite as guilty going here as opposed to other places because everything is so simple and fresh. I've visited Tasty Crepes a handful of times now and the Nutella and strawberry crepe never fails to disappoint. I do have to mention, however, that although the crepes are great, I definitely give this place 5 stars because of the service. The same gentleman has taken my order every time I have stopped by and has been incredibly pleasant! Will definitely be back.
I always get the crepes with fruit and the fruit is fresh and sweet. The crepes are huge and delicious especially with ice cream on top. Love love love this place!!

I've been here many a time for dessert crepes, once and a while for a scoop of Thrifty's ice cream for my girlfriend, and I even had a black olive pizza crepe one time. 

Everything is made to order, which is ideal. No idea where they get their fruits, but I feel like the mangos, pineapple, and berries are always in season. I love that I've only ever seen the owners behind the counter, a dynamic duo that keeps that "mom and pop" feel, and ensures the quality is consistent. It's a must try for all the dessert lovers in Summerlin and Spring Valley, or just anyone who doesn't feel like going to the strip for a quality crepe. 

Five stars, tried and true.
This place is amazing! The owners are awesome, humble people who work hard and make amazing crepes.  The mango and rice is yummy as well... try the savory crepe or the fruit.. both great.
The crepes her are delicious. The chocolate covered bananas are amazing. Best dessert place I've been to

Great food and customer service!  All ingredients are fresh!  Great place for kids!  We had a banana split, daughter had frozen banana bites and my son had a mixed berry crepe.  All of our food was great, if it's busy I could the service being slow because everything is made to order.

10/10 Amazing! Service is good, design and ordering is very simple and nice, and the food is more than delicious. Their crepes are larger than what most served in Vegas and the fruit always taste sweet. 

No other crepe place can compare. Love them

This place is a little hidden but once you find it, you'll be glad that you did! I went in last week to check the place out and it was the best decision I made! It was so good I had to make a yelp account LOL. Best fruit crepes I have had in a long time and this place deserves 6 stars for the awesome service and great food.
Friendly, fast, fresh, and very delicious! We just enjoyed a fruit crepe at this lovely place. Would highly recommend and visit again.
First time here. VERY, very good. Definitely will come back. :) They are very generous on serving size.  Mmmmmm....

I love Crepes and have tried them in many places. Tasty Crepes are the best. They fill the crepes with the best fresh fruit and so much of it.  The owners are so nice and friendly too. I try to get there once a week. I'm addicted!!

Just left this awesome shop.... they have not only ice cream crepes but a wide variety of specialty fruit crepes, sandwich and pizza crepes! The owners were friendly and recommended the best items that we loved! On top of that, they offered only the FRESHEST FRUITS, cut right in front of us. Even better, their offerings included FRESH MANGO, which aren't even in season right now! It was fresh, ripe, juicy & DELICIOUS!! A MUST TRY FOR ANYONE IN VEGAS! ALOHA

Fuck this place! Not Kid friendly at all. I went into the store to give my son ice cream for his birthday and the store owner yelled at us and kicked us out because we only spent five dollars and said my son was being "too loud". He's only 2 years old and was laughing and dancing. I don't know what's "too loud" about a kids' laughter. The food wasn't even good and the cones were stale . So fuck your five dollars . You didn't even deserve it .

I was on the search for some cheesecake, and this place popped up on my yelp search. My mistake for not browsing through the menu more carefully that they don't actually have cheesecake, but I got distracted by the crepes! I gotta say, I think this place is wayyy better than any crepes offered on the strip. I got a fruit crepe with ice cream but everything on their menu looked so good. Definitely wanna try out their pizza crepes! They also have chocolate covered cheesecake, fruit bites, and cake bites, and boba tea!
Hands down the best crepery around! There are plenty of toppings to choose from, the fruit is fresh, service is friendly, and the crepes are so yummy!  A must!
Best crepes in the world!  Friendly service. Awesome Taro Boba smoothie, shave ice, ice cream, fresh fruit. Something for everyone !!!!

This place is absolutely amazing is every way. I've been here 3 times so far and every time I went, it wasn't busy at all. The service of this place is flawless, everyone I met was really sweet and really nice. They obviously care a lot about their customers. I've only tried their crepes so far and it is amazing for their prices. It's around 8 dollars for their crepes with ice cream and the portions are huge. I wasn't able to finished one. This place quickly grown to be one of my favorite places. Everything about this place is flawless. I highly recommend.
The best crepe I've had in a long time. Definitely one of the Vegas hidden jewels. Will be back very soon!
I love this place and the owner is cool. The crepes are amazing! Only reason I gave it 4 stars not 5 is because it just takes too long to get your order. Only one person is making the food :(

Tasty Crepes is a wonderful way to end the night with a sweet tooth. Friendly environment, Staff, and Delicious Crepes. I like how everything there is right in front of you making it harder to place in order because everything there just looks so darn delicious lol. I will always continue to come here and enjoy my food and deserts here.

This place is soooooooo gooooood! They are so awesome. They make great crepes and however you like. Customize just for you on how you like it. This place is so clean and nice. The people that own it are very nice and down to earth people. Easy to talk to. I sooooo recommend this place to everyone, anyone, that would like any great dessert and food. You will not regret how bomb there dessert and food is. The price for the food is so worth it and the portion they give you. Seriously you won't be sorry.
I've been to other crepe stores in las vegas. But this crepe houe is extraordinary~ they only use fresh fruit everytime and the size is begger than anywhere else. It is almost Twice as big.

Definitely lived up to its name!

Greeted in a prompt and friendly manner when I walked in. Their crepe ordering process is made simple by marking how you'd like it on a slip of paper. I like this because I think it ensures that you'll get your crepe made exactly the way you want it, without the crepe maker possibly forgetting an item.

Got my fruit crepe to go, so didn't get a chance to take a look at it until I got home. But WOW it was plentiful with large pieces of strawberries and kiwis. And lots of whipped cream, which I wanted. It was a pleasant surprise just how much fruit there was inside! My crepe maker did not skimp out on the ingredients at all!  Should have taken a picture but I already wolfed it down before I remembered.

Also, my crepe was made very fast. I've ordered crepes at other places that would take up to 10 mins to fulfill. Granted I was the only person in the store at the time, but it took only about 4-5 mins for my crepe to be done and packaged.

It was clean inside, fairly spacious, friendly service... added to the list of reasons to come back.

This place is so amazing.  Kinda quiet because it's being other places but you should go.  Parking isn't that bad and the place is really clean.  Ice cream was so good with our crepe.  Highly recommend it

Let me start by saying that this place is amazing, everything is fresh. I live far from this place but it is the only place I like my crepes from so the drive is so worth it. Staff is very friendly and helpful and ordering is very easy and they even give u an option if u want soft, medium, or crunchy crepes. I recommend this place you won't regret it.

This has become the new spot for pure deliciousness!!! We got there 3 minutes before closing time on a Sunday, and were treated with smiles and welcomes! The menu was sooooo full of the yummiest fruits and flavors it was a challenge choosing! We all got crepes that were overloaded with freshness and it was amazing! We were very pleased and plan in going back... Having desert pre-ordered for a Halloween party next wkd. Fair prices, clean place, friendly staff and excellent product: recipe for success!

I've only tried the sweet crepes so far but every time I go it's very good. Seems to be a man and a woman that work there im assuming a couple he's usually with customers and other stuff while she makes the crepes. Seem to be nice people ... consistent too.
Yum! Stopped in for a quick lunch. The deli crepe was good and our dessert crepe was even better! The staff was really friendly and attentive.

Love the crepes here! I get the fruit crepe with strawberries, mixed berry, pineapple and Nutella. The fruit is really fresh and the portions are generous. It's a little pricy but it's worth it as a treats.
I LOVE THIS PLACE. The portions are plentiful, the owners are sweet and the deserts are Amazing!!!!

Tasty Crepes has probably been my go to spot for crepes for the past 2 years or so. I honestly love the whole set up of how to order your crepes with the paper. It makes it so easy I usually get a crepe or the strawberry shortcake I think that's what it's called and I'm never disappointed. They owners are always super friendly. Punch card system is one of my favorite this about it also a always down for a crepe.

Woooooow these are the best crepes I have ever had!!!!!  The service is good, prices are fair, and the menu is unique!!!  It has like a little cafe feel to it and it's always very clean.  The location is kind of fat, but it's worth the drive, no question about that.  They also serve warm, super tasty.  Love it!!

Fantastic!!!! The crepes are awesome, they have thrifty ice cream, and Nutella. It's like the triple crown of delicious!!! 

Plus, they have smoothies, boba tea, and fresh fruit!!! And the people at the counter are total sweethearts!!!

I thought I had written a review for this place before. The sweet crepes are as good as it gets. I have been to France and had crepes there, yes Vegas crepes are better than France. They use the best quality fruit and they sure don't hold back on the ingredients. Those babies are loaded! My favorite is the pineapple-strawberry nutella, just glorious! The savory crepes are ok, but can't compare to the sweet ones. Do yourself a favor and go get the best crepe in town!

The crepes here are fantastic. The ceilings and ingredients for Super Fresh and delicious.

Everything is really high quality and I'm really glad I tried it.

I'll definitely be back.

This place is great ( if you know your crepes) having a European background, crepes are normally made with fruit, and are a sweet delicious treat! If you are looking for a more modern crepe, such as a lunch item, I would recommend la crepe in the Paris hotel. Personally, I love the fruit filled crepes just like Grandma used to make! So if you want a different sweet I would def try Tasty crepes!

WOW! What a place!
I have been to many Crepe places in Vegas here. And even one close by my home made by some French people on Durango. But you don't need to be French, to know how to really make a Tasty Crepe. I am from the Chicago MidWest, where good food is on every corner. Just like in France or Italy. And this place could fit in just perfect. I love the Avocado Shakes, and Blueberry Stacked and Stuffed Crepes! WOW! And Fresh made, right on the grill. If you ever been to very fancy Crepe places in Southern France. This is just like them. I am a return customer here now for 4 years. And will only pick here for my Crepes. The owners serve you and are a very nice team. Thank you for the best Crepes, and Avocado Shakes.
Plenty of options for sweet and savory options. We ordered mango with sticky rice, a brownie crepe, and a pizza crepe, all were very delicious. Staff was also really friendly. :)

Fresh ingredients, nice service!  They have a few types if crepes you can get like pizza or deli.  Every veggie or fruit is cut up right there, not orepped, and you can see everything being made.  They also have thrifty ice cream and everything you order is custom! The owners work there and make the food and it's obvious that they care about their product.  Great for lunch!!

Most delicious crepes I've ever tasted!! The owners are sweet and amazing. The place is so clean and everything is delicious. My favorite is the chocolate covered cheesecake!! DELICIOUS!!!!! I've visited crepe station before and was so unhappy with their service. The crepes were not good at all... You can't go wrong tasty crepes is the most delicious place for shakes, crepes, chocolate covered bananas/cheesecake and more!!!!!

I go to this place every week for my watermelon smoothie, my first time was for a sundae, my boyfriend introduced me to this place, and he's cheap so this is a worthy price, tasty like promised, served with a smile. Cute little place for a date, your kids, and cold place to lounge & snack. If anyone disagrees, has entitled a bad review to this place, idk where else u would go that meets this place genuine service and great food. I highly recommend its simplicity, and wonderful atmosphere

I've been coming here since they opened & they've always been consistent!!! BEST crepes I've ever had!!! And they're the nicest owners, I love them!!! WARNING: YOU CAN SHARE, BUT NOT RECOMMENDED!!! U'LL want it all 2 urself

We ordered mango w/ sticky rice, savory crepes, brownie crepe and fruit crepe. What can I say, all of them are delicious. 
Friendly owners.

I ordered a savory crepe with cheese, mushrooms, tomatoes and spinach. It wasn't bad but I felt the crepe dough was too sweet, it would work well with fruit and ice cream type crepe but kinda strange with savory ingredients in my opinion.

I've only had the crepes here but there are lots of other good looking things on the menu. The crepes are the best in town. So good! And the owners are so nice and welcoming. Great customer service here! If I could come here everyday I would. Jealous of those who live nearby. I live across town and make the trip out here on the weekends just for these crepes.

Wow wow wow! This place is delicious. Don't let the limiting menu options fool you. So amazingly good. I'd give them 10 stars if I could. The crepes are airy fluffy and crisp at the same time and they are a good size so you get a good portion. I got the turkey cheese avocado and onions in my crepe. Absolutely delightful. Super delish. Polite and great service. Awesome place!

A few days ago I was having a crepe craving and we came across this spot. It's a little hole in the wall place, but it was surprisingly good.

The inside is a little empty..and white.. 

Everything is ordered through these pieces of paper. The crepes have all these fruit, filling, topping, and ice cream options. You circle what you want in your crepe. Same for the bobas.

I ordered a crepe with strawberries, bananas, Nutella, whipped cream, powdered sugar, and cookies n cream ice cream. It was bomb! 

We got 2 crepes, 2 bobas, and a large milk for $28, so the prices are fair. Service was friendly.

They have lots of frozen treats too. Chocolate cheesecake, chocolate bananas, etc. The only thing I recommend is having more savory crepe options. I only saw a few.
Sooooo gooood!     The ice cream crepes are ridiculous.  They are large enough to share, but come on...you know you want one to yourself.

Can't say enough about this place! Got a savory crepe and it was amazing. Fiance got a Boba tea which he said was average... But the crepe was ridiculous and can easily rival the ones you get on the streets of Paris! Very affordable and massive portions! One crepe is very easily shareable between two people!
I love coming here. I've been coming here for a while now and service is always great. The crepes are delicious.
I liked how organized the ordering process was to order a crepe. And the size of the crepe is so big and delicious. I'm definitely coming again
We stopped here to fix our craving for a dessert. Service was prompt, friendly, and helpful. Delicious and fresh crepes! Hit the spot!!

You must try the fruit crepe with chocolate and Nutella! 

It was my son's 16th birthday. We were out celebrating with dinner and dessert. So, we ended our night by going to Tasty Crepes for some dessert. The pleasant staff enhanced the experience by adding a lit candle to his selection. That was nice.

With the new craze for boba, my son thought he would extend his new favorite treat to an ice cream sundae. My son's boba ice cream sundae was topped with whipped cream, a cherry, and a candle on top. He also really enjoyed his selection.

I ordered a fruit crepe that consisted of strawberries, blue berries, bananas, and vanilla ice cream. It had Nutella and chocolate. It was super good! 

The staff was very helpful and pleasant. The ice cream shop was clean. I will come back very soon!

Best fruits crepes in town, even better than places in Strip resorts and customer service is top notch.  My wife left a stellar review but it was "not recommended" according to yelp.  so I wanted to leave a review.  See Kalynn B to read more.

This place is awesome! The owners are super friendly, if it's your first time they walk you through their menu. The prices are fair for the quality and quantity of food you're getting. They provide you with a punch card if you're a regular it's an awesome thing to have available. We're definitely coming back!

The crepes here are definitely tasty and definitely huge. I've eaten my fair share of crepes at various restaurants, but this place has the biggest crepes I've ever seen/eaten. They aren't shy on the toppings, that's for sure. Also the owners are very friendly and accommodating. I have a pretty big family so when we place a to-go order it takes them awhile to prepare it, but they handle large orders well and are still kind enough to take the time to label each box with the exact order. Tasty Crepes is my go-to for late night sweet cravings and they never disappoint.

Place is awesome! Service is great, and their crepes are delicious. Highly recommend this place. I'm definitely coming back. I got crepe with banana, strawberry and kiwi, oh, and cookies and cream.....delicious!!!!

We spied the sign of Tasty Crepes while getting gassed up at Texaco's Tropicana and Fort Apache station. It was around nine o'clock on a typical hot August night in Southwest Las Vegas. A cheery couple, the owners, greeted us in the upbeat atmosphere, where they have two white leather couches and traditional French-style café tables and chairs. The crêperie has lots of frozen treats to cool off denizens of the desert after dark, including what seems to be a very popular brand of ice-cream. We were pleased with the crêpes--Nutella for him and just whipped cream and powdered sugar for me. I like my crêpes well-done, and am going to state my preference next time, which seems only logical when the  cook prepares them in front of you--the texture and delicate consistency were perfect. I'm also going to have a frozen, chocolate-covered banana, which is a fantastic concept for dessert in the desert. I took some pics of this sweet little spot with the bright polka-dots. By the way, for you fellow germ-o-phobes, I found the restroom to be very clean and tidy. The whole place, including what I saw behind the counters, was immaculate and customer-friendly.

CREPE HEAVEN!! Their crepes are HUGE, and that's even without the ice cream. Their frozen fruits covered in chocolate taste amazing, and their super friendly here. Can't find a single thing to complain about. Come stop by whenever you get the chance, otherwise you're missing out :)

This place is just delicious!! After coming in a few times, the service and quality of food is exquisite!! Amazing place for a date or just hanging out with friends. The owners are really nice and knows their crepes!!

Best crepes in town. Have been going to this location since it opened and will not go to any other place. The size of the crepes are huge and well worth the money. They are always soooooo delicious and their fruits are always fresh!
Still coming here, still awesome!  They have the freshest fruit, perfect crepes.  You owe it to yourself to try this place,you won't be disappointed.

It's been over three years since I've started coming here and contrary to how many check ins I have, I've been here well over 50 times and we have NEVER been dissatisfied. My party of three gets crepes each time and they are so delicious and never disappoint. Regardless of which combination you get, and they have a ton of options, it'll result in a great tasting crepe that leaves you beyond full because of their generous proportions.

I don't usually go for sweet crepes but I like the build your own! I did the strawberry and honey dew as fruits, Nutella inside and vanilla ice cream with powdered sugar on top. I can't begin to tell you how flavorful the fruits were, they were perfect. The ice cream was thrifty brand which is always good and never melted! I will be back to try other things!
Excellent place for crepes. Everything is fresh and services is excellent.  Highly recommended.
Love this place. First time here and I'm amazed. The chocolate dip fruits are bomb af

Amazing crepes! Around $8 but comes with generous amount of ice cream and fruit! They have so many different ice cream flavors and you can choose how crispy you want the crepe. They also have punch cards and the couple who owns it are always so friendly. They have other desserts and drinks that look good too.

As the name states, this spot has crepes- and they are tasty! Portion sizes are huge and the DIY ordering style allows you to select your sweet or savory fillings from fruits, meats, cheese, ice cream, sauces, and various veggies. Create the healthiest crepe you want or go all-out on sugar, the choice is yours. I do wish they offered grilled chicken strips rather than just sliced deli meats.

Even though it's not mentioned in the name, the real treasure here is the frozen bananas- you can buy them whole on the stick, dipped in chocolate and additional nuts, coconut flakes, or sprinkles, or in pieces to mix and match. This is the ultimate healthy treat for me, and always a stop after hitting up the EZ Fitness gym across the street. 

Staff as friendly and helpful, clean and cheerfully-decorated location is small but welcoming. The parking lot is small and finding a spot can be a hassle at times, but the food is totally worth it.
I love this place! They are very friendly and the crepes are delicious. I got a fruit and my bf a ham (hot). There bobas are delicious too!

Cute little shop in the south side of town! 
They're crepes are fantastic! 
Reasonably priced & they don't hold out on how much they put into your crepe! 

The owners are very friendly & welcoming!

So many items to choose from here. They have everything from dessert crepes, to deli crepes, boba & smoothies, chocolate covered fruit & other items, Thifty's ice cream, and even mango & sticky rice when it's in season!

The portions are huge for the price and you can definitely share! 

Definitely recommend this place & will continue coming back with my family!

Aww the owners here are really nice. They explain everything and kept asking if the crepe is good. They even give you a card to stamp for each crepe you order so you can earn towards a free crepe in the future.  It's a cozy little place that serves delicious crepes. 

I stumbled across this place when I was experiencing this intense crepe craving. Came here this afternoon with my mom since we both have a sweet tooth. You can order the fruit crepe by filling out this small piece of paper. I ordered a crepe with strawberries, kiwi, and blueberries, with Nutella, whipped cream, powdered sugar, and butter pecan ice cream. It was really good! The portion size is huge. The fruit taste fresh and the crepe comes with a good amount of fruit. .

Great as always! They remember what we get, i love this place , the owners are  always there with a smile and ready to  satisfy your sweet tooth wither is a crepe we choose or their delicious sticky rice with mango or just a fruit salad it's the freshest you can get. Just a great lunch or the best way to end your day Tasty Crepes is bomb awesome.
I was shocked at how HUGE this crepe was!!! It was fabulous! Perfect for sharing! You've gotta try this and the staff was great, and really clean place!!

Great options, great service.  And super delicious food.   Can't believe this place has been open for years right nearby and I've only just tried it.  

Savory and sweet crepes were awesome.  Thai iced tea with boba was a great treat too.

Will be back soon to try the waffles and other desserts!

The name fits the business. I had a savory crepe with turkey with mozzarella, spinach, mushrooms, tomato and avocado. It was about $9.00 and It was good. I'll return here again. 
The service was good, and the place was clean.  You order at the counter and the lady was very nice.

This is my favorite place to get crepes!! Totally recommend it, the crepes are amazing, the people there are amazing and really want to give you the best service they can give. Love them! Always coming here

Cute hangout, it was empty when my husband & I arrived. They have smoothies, ice cream, soda, water etc. Ifyou come you must try the crepe, you get a card to pick your toppings and they are Very Generous with their portions. I will definitely come back when I am in Vegas :)

Great place for all kinds of crepes. This is the 2nd crepe place I have been to and I was impressed at how many options Tasty Crepes offers- deli, pizza, and ice cream. They are reasonably priced and had great speedy customer service. I will be back.

This place has the BEST crepes!  My husband and I showed up 15 mins before they closed and the staff, (which I do believe were the owners) were so welcoming and gave us no issues ordering right before they closed.  Very friendly!!!!! 

I was surprised to see lunch and dinner crepes.  I have never had a crepe with meats and cheese, but my dessert crepe was so delicious I will be back to try more.

You are given a little paper to mark all the items you want on your crepe.  I got a strawberry, banana, with chocolate and Nutella, with their whip cream!!!!!  Let me tell you I am a BIG fan of the "cream cheese" filling some crepe shops have BUT Tasty Crepes had the most incredible whip cream.  Hands down my new favorite filling!  It's made in house and it's SO fluffy and yummy!!!

The fruit was SO fresh and my crepe was cooked perfectly.  They really load up your crepe also...it was filled with fresh fruit!  Highly recommended!!!!

Totally awesome crepes as the savory is warm for dinner and the dessert crepe is magnificent !!'
Homemade whip cream to die for too!

Snowballs or shaved ice is addictive ;) 

Top notch place to eat immaculate also.

Lovely couple owned Elisha and Philip ;)

Outstanding!!! I love crepes and I'm always on the hunt in town to find the best and I think Tasty might be it (we will see:).  The lady that served me was so sweet and kinds and quick!.  The place was super cute and super clean!!! And the actual crepe was delicious (mixed berry, kiwi and strawberry yum!!!)   Will be back.:)
The Biggest biggest Crepes in Lasvegas!  Lots of fresh mixed berries and banana with Malted crunch with whipping cream is amazinggggggg!  Highly recommended.

As I waked in with a severe craving for a delicious crepe, I feared that my expectations would not be met.  I have had some small, dinky, unsatisfying ones around town.   

But this crepe definitely was what I was looking for.  I got bananas, blueberries, whip cream, raspberry sauce and I think chocolate sauce (it's been a few weeks), plus ice cream.  They don't skimp on the fruits or anything.   Fruits were fresh as can be too.   Will be going back for shiZzle.   Hopefully sooner rather than later.   Friendly staff and place is clean and inviting.   Yum yum yum.

My wife and I love crepes, especially ones from Tasty Crepes because they really are tasty! They're also very generous with their portions. I'd recommend sharing one unless you're eating one as a meal, which we've done many times before!

While they have both savory and sweet crepes, our newest obsession is with their pizza crepes! All the flavor of a slice of pizza, but without as many carbs or gluten; similar to a Hot Pocket but 100 times better! We also love their chocolate covered fruit bites. Try the white chocolate covered mango! Mmmm!! Mix and match any 5 fruit bites for only $3.50!

Highly recommend this spot. We drive all the way down to the SW from the NW just for their crepes at least once, if not twice a month! Best crepes in town especially at their $8 price point!!

The crepes are huge and definitely delicious! Easy to order by checking the boxes on a piece of paper. I've also tried the mango sticky rice which is definitely a plus also!  the chocolate covered bananas are delicious also!

This place rocks!

I've been here a few times since last summer, and every time is great. 
The quality is great, the service is great, and the crepes are great.

What more could you ask for?
Huge fan on the crepes here. Very decent portion sizes and delicious! Among the other many desserts to choose from, this is the place to go. Staff is also friendly!

3.5*.  Had a pair of crepes here after reading the reviews.  Honestly, not bad, but not incredible.  I would not kill myself to return, but if I was in the area, I would pop in should I desire a crepe, especially with the dearth of crepe places in Las Vegas.  The fillings are mainly fruit and chocolate, caramel etc.  The crepe I had was not really soft, it was crispy and broke apart as I ate it, so it was overcooked, as was my wife's.  The fillings were good, but it was just some ice cream and fruit.  At $9 for a crepe, its a little pricey too, considering a scoop of ice cream, some fruit and the crepe is all it consists of.  I am sure had the crepes been better prepared, I would have given it 4, but since both were breaking apart as we ate them, it was disappointing.  Some of the other options look decent, and they have some ice cream desserts also.  Its Thrifty ice cream, so it gets a bonus for the nostalgia value, but if you are expecting high quality, artisan style ice cream, think again.  Very good service and friendly staff though.

Crepe heaven! 

So, let's start this review with the fact I was under the misconception that crepes were for only dessert and sweet. Wrong! This trip on my birthday to tasty crepes educated me on the other crepe options.

We found tasty crepes due to our trusty best friend Yelp. Five stars and truly a hidden treasure. You can't really see it from the road way and that I a tasty shame. 

Walking in the decor throws me back to child like themes and sweet shops. Pastel colors cover the walls in an inviting happy color splash. Lime, bubblegum pink and light blue. The place is very clean, open and plenty of seats. 

The menu is very easy to read, understand, and see the different options. They have deli crepes, savory crepes and then sweet crepes. The deli is similar to a deli sandwich except with crepe instead of bread. Savory was to die for. We got a savory crepe with turkey, bell pepper, onion, mozzarella and spinach. It was delicious. Mouthwatering. Big enough for two to share. The crepe was crispy yet pancake soft like. We also got a sweet crepe to share with was huge too. I was excited to see that they serve thrifts ice cream with their crepes as thrifty is one of my favorite. Sad there are not any rite AIDS out here. We had a ice cream crepe with crunchy chocolate ice cream with banana, strawberry and Nutella inside. Mmmmm. Loved that there was a great amount of ice cream and fruit. The ratio was perfect and flavored complimenting each other. 

The service was fantastic. The owner came over and explained what they sell, different options, the favorites and lastly he came over and asked how it was, while taking our plates from us. I couldn't have been happier with this place.
Fresh, great customer service, and variety.. wow!!!cheap too. Gonna bring my kids. Very clean place also, happy I live right around the corner.
Nice to find a good dessert place by our house.  Really enjoyed it, the employees were very nice.  The crepe topping choices were excellent.

Yum! Came here today and shared a crepe with my husband. It was on a whim that we went in and were so glad we did, it left me wanting more. Fast service. Easy and convent, did I mention yum?! We got a sweet crepe with bananas, strawberries, Nutella and whip cream- a favorite of mine back when I used to visit a creperie in the UK. They did a bang up job, I can't wait to return to this place!

What a great find!! My girl and I just left the dentist. What do you do after the dentist? Look for some chow of course. Wanted something different than the usual burger or fast food. 
Saw the crepe sign and one U turn later we were inside. 
Walked in and were greeted right away. Was asked if we've been in before. Replied first time and she explained how to order. Handed us a sheet to check off what we wanted our crepe to be. There were so many types of crepes. Fruit, a full meal and of course a dessert. 
We went with one that was perfect for our appetite. The Savory crepe. Turkey, avocado, green pepper, tomatoes and mozzarella cheese. It was so good. We will be back. 
Decided to order a banana Nutella crepe to go and have for later. 
Do something different and get a crepe made the way you want it!
I love dessert crepes and this place is really good :) We've been meaning to come in here.  Very impressed at how clean this place and the staff are friendly.

The BEST place for crepes! The family that owns this place used to have a stand in the indoor swap meet before opening this place and they are the nicest people ever. Have never had anything less than great service here. 

For ~$8, you pick up to 3 (fresh!) fruit fillings for your crepe, sauces, powdered sugar/homemade whipped cream, and a scoop of ice cream. I always have to go with mixed berries, bananas, and strawberries on the inside, nutella on the bottom, caramel drizzled on top, and fresh whipped cream and a scoop of ice cream on the inside. It is big enough to split between two people, although at some point you will find yourself thinking you should've hogged it to yourself. 

They offer a variety of other dessert options, plus a few savory crepes. Always very clean and quiet, and a nice place to hang out and enjoy a delicious dessert. I've been here many times and will be back many more! 

Note: They do have a minimum charge (I believe it's $10) for using debit/credit cards unless you want to pay an extra fee, so try to pay in cash.

Food was so good! We got an omelette crepe (not sure what it's called on the menu behind the counter) and the lady that served us was really nice and patient. There was another couple there as well. I loved the frozen chocolate covered fruits (especially the mango!). I wish it was closer to us :( that's the only downside. Prices were very reasonable. The shop is small and there was another guy working there who was so helpful and kind with helping my daughter pick out frozen fruits to put in her cup.
Delicious crepes. I love supporting small business. The owners are always friendly and such hard workers! The size of the desert crepes are so worth it.

The crepes are sooo good! Especially with fresh fruit and thrifty ice cream! Also they make their own whip cream from scratch and it's awesome! Also try the frozen chocolate dipped bananas, their amazing!

A very friendly place. The portion size is huge! Fill out a small little form and in less than 5 minutes your order is on your table! They have other yummy treats that I have yet to try! Make sure you ask for a stamp card!

Amazing service! The place is sparkling clean, Phillip and two other ladies helped us and they were super nice! Phillip checked up on us to see if we were doing okay and showed a great interest in his customers, Highly recommend this location!!

Best and freshest smoothies in town. The owners operate it every day and keep it clean and fresh. I've been eating their crepes and drinking their smoothies since back when they had a booth in the fantastic swap meet!!! They have been in this Fort Apache location for over five years now. I highly recommend everything here from the ice cream to the boba and the root beer floats. The frozen cheese cake slices are amazing. Check it out you won't be disappointed.

Tried the pizza crepe. Absolutely amazing. Wife had the Nutella banana crepe. Two thumbs up there too. 

The place looks like a hold in the wall to me. But the food is amazing. Def would recommend to friends.
Yummy, fresh and great service! They have variety of desserts from floats to chocolate dipped fruit. It's worth a try!
I don't have a big sweet tooth but wow! Amazing desserts :D the staff is super friendly which only makes your trip sweeter.
Such a hidden gem! I had both a savory and sweet crepe and both where amazing! the ice cream was do die for! I will be returning very soon!!! Well worth every penny spent!

I was immediately greeted upon arrival. I came in specifically for a crepe, so I started to look at the menu with my sisters. Then the guy who greeted us gave my sisters and I a little piece of paper to fill out. Which I think is a great idea! It prevents mistakes, you basically fill out the paper with all the toppings you want in your crepe. The lady who made the crepes did an amazing job because they were delicious!!! The customer service here is above and beyond. The guy who was working the register was super nice made me feel very welcomed. I will for sure hands down be back soon!!

So far I've been on here twice. Each time the lady (I think the owner?) has been the one to take our order. Service is excellent and the crepes are delicious!   I have only had the dessert type crepe here. I would like to try the other items on their menu. I will definitely be back to try them.

I had just finished climbing the Tinjana Peak at Red Rock Canyon and I was starved.  

Prior to my trip I had bookmarked some recommended places and since this was not far from my condo, I went for it, and OMG I'm so glad I did.

I have to offer penance for my gluttony because I had TWO crepes.  I had the Savory Veggie Crepe with added Turkey...AND.. I had a Fruit Crepe (pineapple, banana, strawberry, with vanilla ice cream).   I got them to go, and didn't notice how BIG they were till I got back to my room, and was like "WHOOOOAAA".   I said to myself..."gonna be an early night"...because I knew that once I ate them I was gonna pass out.  But hey, I climbed to the top of Tinjana and I was good for it, ya'll!  

Best crepes I've EVER had in life.  We had a crepe place in Cincinnati that was off the chain, but compared to this one...no contest!

The place was very nice, bright, clean and welcoming, and the owners were super duper cool.  I told him it was my 50th Birthday and he hooked me up with a couple of extra card punches and told me to stop back by before I left in a few days.  Niiiiice!!!

If you're visiting Vegas and want the hook up on some dope-ass Crepes...check out Tasty Crepes.  You'll eat too much and you'll feel like a pig...but so what?  Yummy!!

It was 9:00pm and my boyfriend and I were starving but didn't want a heavy meal nor fast food. I am a Hard Core Yelper, so I whipped out my phone to find what was in the area. Tasty Crepes came up. I scanned the pictures and decided immediately.

We arrived a little before 9:30 and there were 2 employees present. Gentleman was kind, very patient and informative. Boyfriend ordered a pizza crepe and I ordered a savory crepe. We also agreed on white and dark chocolate covered pineapples and mango! We spent around $20 for everything. The crepes were being made fresh and the smell of sweet pancakes hits you in the face. They also served ice cream and smoothies.

 THE FOOD WAS AMAZING! HUGE PORTIONS TOO! THAT was a surprise. We both saved one half for lunch he next day. Gentleman came and asks how our food was while we were eating. I LOVE the customer service!! He cleared our table and chatted with us. We were very delighted to have found this cute shop. We will definitely be back for more! I very much recommend!

This place is amaaazziinnggg!!! I'm a huge fan of crepes and waffles and I was hoping my crepe and waffle would meet my craving and it did beyond that! My new favorite dessert spot! Portions are huge and satisfies any craving you have!

The creeps are delicious!  They use Thrifty ice cream which is always tasty. I love how they take your order, you check the boxes of all the things you want on your crepe on a sheet of paper. The only reason I didn't give it give stars was because it's a little expensive, but they do have a punch card which is always a nice bonus for loyal customers. We will certainly be back for more.

Best crepes I've ever tasted! Disclosure, I've never tried crepes before :) 

Got a dessert crepe with mixed fruits and a savory one with turkey and ham.  The turkey and ham may be the best sandwich I've ever had in my life (and I've had a lot of sandwiches).  Only complaint was they wouldn't let you split the meats half and half, you have to pay $3 for double meat (which was a little too much on this size sandwich).  Other than that, it was a great first experience and I will definitely be back.
Just went tonight for crepes AWESOME! Had Strawberry, Blueberry, Nutella,Caramel, Whipped cream Powdered  sugar. Fresh  fruit ,Good service so going back.

This place is absolutely amazing. I found it when I use to go to the gym right by it. The owners are so sweet and the wife is Thai, so you know the Thai tea is authentic! The savory crepes are delectable and it was the first time I every tried non-sweet crepes. I wasn't disappointed. The portions are huge! I brought my brother and sister, my mom. They all love it as much as I do! Go try it now.

We passed this place so many times since it opened... then one day the wife and I finally decided to try it out.  We shared a sweet crepe with vanilla ice cream, bananas and caramel sauce.  This thing was AWESOME but I had to limit it bc I am type 2 diab. Lucky for me my wife enjoyed it too... WINK WINK...  Only if there was a sugar free/carb free dessert crepe.  
There are a variety of bite size desserts there like frozen bananas and cheesecake bites which I have yet to try but will try on next visit. This place has a pleasant atmosphere and is very clean.  The people behind the counter are very nice and courteous. I assumed they are the owners.  I definitely will be back.  Check it out... you might like it!!!

Great place if you'd love a sweet snack~ I love the concept of the "Build your own -----", leaves little room for error, & a lot of room for a custom snack. The employees are so sweet & the punch cards that they have, make it more tempting for constant visits.

This place was pretty solid. I did not enjoy their sandwich like crepe, but they do pile them up a lot. I reccomend going here for dessert because the crepes here are huge and they don't cheap out on their fruit and sweets. Try to spend over $10 because then you get charged a $1 for using your card.
They are always so friendly when we walk in, fast and their crepes are super yummy. I am so glad we found this place.

I LOVE THIS PLACE!!!!! The owners are soooo friendly!!! Crepes are AMAZING!!!!! They give you so much fruits to the point I have to share it with 2 other people. 

This is the best place for crepes!!

They even have mango sticky rice and boba!!!

Always FRESH FRUITS!


Love love this place!!!!

I got the banana nutella crepe and my hubbs got the pizza crepe....Total topping overload.

around $20 for 2 crepes plus a bottled water each. But fresh ingredients (she made it in front of us and cut up everything fresh out of the fridge before cooking)

its a small place and theyve got a alot of smoothies and boba on the menu too! def will be back
Always fresh, always tasty!! Great, friendly atmosphere. Love coming here and bringing my little one. So glad I found this place.

I really don't know how long I've had this place bookmarked, but I'm sure glad I finally got a chance to come down! This family owned and operated dessert haven can be found in the back of a Walgreens shopping center on the corner of Tropicana & Fort Apache. It's a pretty small location, with most of it's space being taken up by the large open kitchen area. Even so, there's still a good amount of seating, even some comfy couches and the place is extremely clean.

So, why do I call it a dessert haven? Take a look at their menu and you'll quickly understand. You wouldn't know it from their name, but they offer a whole lot more than just crepes...which I might as well add that they come in both savory and sweet varieties, and can be customized to your liking via little sheets on the counter. But also on the menu are a whole line of Thrifty ice creams which can be added to the crepes, had by the scoop or used in all sorts of sundaes, splits, cones, etc. If that wasn't enough, they have a whole line of chocolate covered frozen fruits and cheesecakes. Still not catching your attention? Well, there's also several boba drinks, smoothies and even a boba ice cream sundae!

After spending about 10 minutes drooling over the menu, I ended up ordering a sweet crepe with Nutella, peanut butter, banana, strawberry, chocolate ice cream and whipped cream. While I do love the custom sheet order system, they ended up forgetting the blueberries I also marked down...not a huge deal, but it always sucks to have stuff missing. With that being said, the crepe itself was thin, light, fluffy and one of the better one's I've had. The fruit I did have was fresh and if you take a look at the photo I posted, they aren't skimpy with the toppings at all. There was plenty of everything, including the Nutella and even though Thrifty isn't my favorite ice cream, the chocolate was good and not freezer burnt like I've seen other Thrifty shops serve. It was just absolutely delicious and about the only thing I wish they'd do is add an option to have nuts like almonds, walnuts or whatever as a topping for the crepes. I also got a taste of my sons boba ice cream and the boba was cooked near perfect, so I wouldn't hesitate to order a boba drink here either.

Pricing is pretty spot-on and close to other similar joints. The portions here are huge though and we only spent about $18, which ended up being just too much food. Being that they are a bit far from where I live, it won't be often that I go out of my way...but with so many tasty dessert options and friendly staff, I'd say this is a must try!

I love coming to this place. The owners are just the friendliest people and their service is great. The crepes are top notch and they are very generous with toppings! My personal favorite menu item is the boba ice cream though! So YUMMY and I'd never think to put boba on an ice cream sundae until I saw it here. Go try one for yourself today!
The crepes are truly tasty! Just like the name. All the ingredients in both the savory and fruit crepes were fresh and made to order. Real yummy! Can't wait to come back again.

This place was empty when we got there. I was expecting the worse but I definitely judged a book. Y it's cover. The crepes were AMAZING. The portion was huge and the fruit was very fresh! The owners were very nice and were very considerate and super friendly! Had a great conversation with them. I would recommend this place to anyone!

Very friendly service! Great food! Good variety and more than just an ice cream shop. They have pizza and deli crepes too! Our family also appreciated that there was an indoor dining area with enough places to sit. They just need one of those little mini counter trash cans for their sample spoons. And napkin dispensers on each table would be nice too.

Next time you are in Vegas. You have to go to this place !  They make some very tasty Crepes full of fresh fruits like blueberries, Rasberries, Kiwi, Strawberries, Banana with Fresh cream,  Nutella or chocolate. Great ice cream selection also. Smoothies are the Best !

Well I live right down the street from this place, and I finally decided to try it out. Definitely not upset with my decision. I got a strawberry, mango, Nutella, added a scoop of the chocolate ice cream,  and of course chocolate sauce and white powdered sugar. It was heaven!!! They Definitely don't  screw you on the insides. They pack it up! It had so much flavor. They were very nice and friendly too. I will definitely be going back, I want to try their deli crapes!
Phillip and his employees are friendly and kind! Love the crepes here and it's awesome that they have thrifty's ice cream

Upon arrival, their options look pretty wicked and unique (boba ice cream, cake filling, etc.), but I was already set on having shaved ice. The staff was nice and friendly, and though I took my order to go, the inside atmosphere was very bubbly and inviting. I chose pineapple, mango, and watermelon for my shaved ice. It came out abundant and not overwhelmingly sweet (unlike most places which overload theirs with syrup). My aunt wasn't fond of her sundae topping, which was a buttery-like icing instead of whip, but was otherwise pleased with it. I'm sure I'll be here more often throughout these summer days.

So delicious!! Everything from the crepe itself to the ice cream and fruits were amazing. Adding Nutella and condensed milk also gave it more sweet flavoring. I will come back every time I'm in Las Vegas!

Awesome, family owned and operated restaurant!  The owners are friendly and appreciative,  making sure our experience was enjoyable.   We tried two crepes - and fruity dessert crepe amd a lunch crepe with ham, turkey, and cheese.   The dessert crepe had freshly cut fruit and what seemed like homemade whipped cream on top.  At $8  I was hoping for more fruit, but it was tasty.  The lunch crepe was delicious and full of flavor.  It was $3 extra for two kinds of meat inside.  I recommend this place, just wish the crepes were more hearty!

I am in love with the crepes in this place! The ice cream tastes fresh& the crepes are crunchy on the edges& not doughy like most crepes! Its also not a hassle to order when you order your crepes, they give you a little paper with what kind of ingredients you want inside that you can checklist.
The service is really accommodating& helpful, they always check on you & theyre always friendly everytime I come in(:

Love this place!!!  Great smoothies and frozen bananas. The crepes are the best!  Owners and employees are kind and helpful. Always consistent with service and products. Been coming since they opened and never had a problem.

I did not enjoy my meal, wish I did :-(  I decided to try it based on reviews and proximity to home. Flavor of the food was bland, place was nothing special. Owners did seem nice, but I paid $9 for a sandwich (on a crepe) with a drink and don't plan to go back. Sorry.

This place has quite good crepes. It's owned and operated by a husband and wife team. I didn't encounter any problems with their service. You fill out a little card to personalize and order your crepe. For the sweet crepes ($7.95), you can choose:
1. Up to 3 fruits (they have strawberry, banana, kiwi, mixed berry, blueberry, etc.)
2. As many toppings (chocolate sauce, caramel, nutella, condensed milk, etc.) as you want 
3. Add whipped cream and/or powdered sugar
4. $1 extra charge for a scoop of ice cream (thrifty brand)
5. You can choose crispy, medium, and soft for how you want your crepe to be prepared.

I picked strawberry, banana, and blueberry and also, chocolate sauce, condensed milk and powdered sugar (might as well go all out, right? lol). I also added a scoop of vanilla ice cream. I like my crepes to be thin and crispy on the edges, so I chose the crispy option. 

The crepe was prepared crispy, but all around crispy and not just the edges :). It wasn't as thin as I was hoping for, but overall it tasted good. All of the fruits tasted fresh and they're very generous with them (see pic). The portion was huge; I wasn't able to finish it all.

The only recommendation I have is for them to add a complimentary water station. They currently only have bottled water for $1 each. I also hope they can get a better brand of ice cream, as thrifty ice cream is just subpar.

Definitely a good place to try if you're craving crepes! The price is reasonable considering the amount you get. They have savory and pizza crepes as well. They sell boba drinks, milkshakes, and smoothies. I love supporting small businesses, so I will return and try other items.

If I could give more stars I would. Convenient location right off the freeway, customer service was outstanding and their selection and set up is great. I had the most delicious crepe!! We will be back
My family stopped in for lunch. We were all very happy with our choices.i had the savory crepe and it was amazing!!! Not to mention they also have fantastic deserts!!

I've only ever been to one other crepe shop, once, and then I tried this place. Wow. It has easily become a favorite for both my boyfriend and myself. They have cute little cut-out pages for "savory crepes" "fruity/ice cream waffles/crepes" or "deli" crepes where there's unchecked boxes where you can see exactly what can come in your crepe if you want it. The portions here are LARGE. They also have chocolate covered fruits or other items on the menu you can try as well, like mangos & sticky rice! My first time here I noticed they didn't have a water fountain so I have to take a star off for that because all I drink is water!! They gave my friend who dined with us a water bottle for free, which was very thoughtful & I have since learned to bring my own water (although they do have bottled water for you to purchase!) I am here way too often but it's worth every penny!

Gentleman owns the place is very nice and welcoming. Explained well the options and anticipated all my questions...Now the crepe was not cheap however its good for 2-3 people and they load it up with fruits and you can choose all the toppings as many as you want.

Came here because of all the great reviews that it got from the fellow yelpers. My boyfriend and I were craving crepes for awhile and didn't want to spend 18 bucks on a fancy crepe place so we came here. I was very surprised how delicious they were! I got the savory crepe with turkey and everything in it and my boyfriend got the deli crepe. The savory crepe is huge and can be shared. The deli crepe wasn't as good, and didn't think that it would be cold. I'm not sure if I would get that again. I will come back and try the waffle sandwich and if my tummy has room, a dessert one as well as. Love the interior and the staff is friendly. Btw, they have a stamp card too, so make sure you ask for one!! :)

After eating out, my family was in the mood for a tasty treat for dessert... so we decided to give this place a try. First off, this place is very clean and my girlfriend just absolutely adored the decor and color schemes. Upon arrival we were immediately greeted by the owners. They are nice, inviting and personable people. My family felt very welcomed. I ordered the Nutella crepe with bananas and chocolate chip ice cream. It was DELICIOUS! My family loved the place. I am eager to return and try their pizza crepe!

We ordered the savory crepe and the waffle sandwich. The food was fresh and tasted good. The person working the counter said that she was the owner. We were going to try one of there many dessert items but the food filled us up. We will definitely be back to try some more.

Came here for the first time today with my boss and co workers. I had a turkey, avocado, mozzarella, tomato, onion, spinach crepe. Maybe crepes are just not for me because I felt that the sweet breading wasn't paired well with the salty ingredients. Although the store owner was sweet and I like supporting local business. I would be interested in trying the sweet crepes because I could see that pairing better. Clean, well lit. Overall good customer service and the food was fresh, although they did not have cups of water only bottled water for purchase.

We had a big lunch at one of the Chinese buffet and just craving for a yummy dessert for dinner. Crepes comes to my mind and found this amazing cafe. You will have the choice on how you would like your crepes made. It can be  sweet and fruity or Savory. They have this cute little checklist to help you with your choices. We decided on strawberry, mango and mixed berries with caramel, nutella, powdered sugar and marshmallow. It was a pretty big servings, just right for me and my daughter. The fruits are so sweet and fresh just perfect for the soft chewy crepes. Yummmo!!!
Favorite place to have the world's best crepes, we always go to eat crepes everytime we go to vegas we live in CA and very good prices.

InCREPEable!

I was craving for crepes after a hike today and on the recommendation of fellow "yelpers" we headed to Tasty Crepes. I'm so glad I did.  

Family-owned business, the crepes are made from scratch and are absolutely delicious. This small little eatery is located in S. Fort Apache Rd and W. Tropicana Ave. They are serving breakfast and lunch, with a selection of wallet-friendly sweet and savory crepes, for a mere $6.95 to $8.95 price point.

Their crepe ordering process is made simple by marking what toppings you want on a slip of paper.

They offers a variety of crepes to indulge your every cravings. On this visit I was surprised to find Savory Crepe. I had to try it so I ordered Pizza Crepe with Pepperoni, Salami, Black olives, cheese etc. It looked like a pizza but instead of bread,  it was crepe and was crispy yet pancake soft like. 

I can honestly say that this is one of the best crepe I ever had. It was only $8.95 large enough for 2 people. I can't wait to visit again and try some sweet crepes.

The Thai Tea with boba was the perfect pairing for my crepe.

If you find yourself craving delicious crepes, icecream and frozen yogurt, you won't be disappointed. The staff/owners are friendly and inviting and the place has a nice casual vibe.

Was pleasantly surprised by HOW MUCH I enjoyed this place! The dessert crepe was larger than I expected and the people working there were amiable and patient with us. Great crepe, great ice cream, great service. 10/10

I came here with my sister and friend who are from out of town and so glad that we found this gem! While we were placing our orders I noticed and even commented how clean the entire area is! After each crepe that was made the woman cleaned her station and worked so diligently on each and every crepe that went out. Nothing looked rush and as good as they are pictured. I will say that the portion is pretty big so maybe a cute little dessert spot to bring someone to split. 

Also, I am assuming the owner is very attentive. Warmed my heart!
Its a plus thats its close to where I live, but the fruit crepes are delicious!! Worth trying. Im hooked with the strawberry banana with nutella and powdered sugar.
Best crepes in town! Never disappoint and give you your money's worth. Never going anywhere else for crepes. Great customer service and awesome workers. Thanks tasty crepes!

Our family came in craving crepes for dessert. The owner and his wife run the shop, very great service and very inviting! Very clean, with lots of place to sit. We all ordered our own crepes, not realizing how huge they ended up being! We should have known since the set price allows you to add a good amount of toppings, with so many choices. The fruits are so fresh, they said they go in the morning to pick up fruits for the day. I'm so glad there's a place near our house to go for crepes!

My boyfriend and I went to this place a few weeks ago. It's very clean and the owners are friendly. The crepes are amazing, the fruit is fresh and the whip cream is to die for... Everything is homemade! You must try this place!

Absolutely great place. I live just up the street from here and I'm so glad I found this place. The service was great. Super friendly and very attentive. The crepe and the float were awesome. 10/10 would come again.

Well when it comes crepes this is my FAVORITE! The portion is a lot. It's delicious and fresh. Parking is okay not so great, but its worth the time. The people that works here are friendly. I would give it a 5 star because of its freshness and hospitality.

I love this place! Sweet and savory crepes are delicious. The owners are very, very nice. Definitely a mom and pop place. The store has a nice layout and is clean. Haven't tried the desserts, but they also look awesome.

Was my first time here & I had the fruit crepe. Strawberries, mangos, & bananas all fresh with Nutella spread on the crepe. Can add a scoop of Thrifty ice cream for only a buck. Also, I tried the frozen mango & frozen banana bites which were both amazing! Definitely will be back. Very friendly staff!

So, we made our way over here after a seriously bad craving for Boba. The only unfortunate thing is that I don't live in the area, and probably won't be here often. 

I'm assuming the gentleman at the front was the owner. He was extremely nice and patient with us considering how long we took to decide on what we wanted. The service was fast and the food was delicious. I ordered a black milk tea with boba and a plain chocolate-covered banana. Both were wonderful. The black tea was a little warm when I received it, but swirling around the ice and waiting a moment fixed the issue instantly. No complaints about the banana; simple and sweet. My fiancé had a crepe pizza, which was beyond delicious. The meat and veggies inside were fresh. I was pleasantly surprised. 

Decor is a little vibrant and out there, but overall the crepes are what count. Loved it.

My best friend and I would always drive down to the strip to have crepes but after trying this place never again will we go down there and get in stuck in traffic. This place was soooo delicious! So fresh! The owner/workers were bubbly people. Extremely friendly and nice with smiles on their face! Made us the tastiest crepe ever! Deff recommend this place!

Great place to go for savory or sweet dishes. They also have shave ice-and it's the real deal, not the weird icy mess some places serve. The price for a crepe is around $9, but well worth it. Portions are large!!  Kids leave happy and full

I been here so many times that's the owner knows it's me again. I just want to say is hard to find a place like this one here in vegas. Clean and welcoming place, they don't still from you giving you a good amount of ice cream and fruit.

So my husband keeps raving about this place . It's a good ol Ma and Pop shop. Literally the Pop takes the order and the Ma cooks it. Because it is that good ol fashion made to order home cooking there is a little wait time. But it is DEFINITELY worth it !!!! I wouldn't go here if you're in a hurry . Anyways my husband went to grab me some take out. Their crepes can be made as a sweet dessert or savory dinner . I am a vegetarian so I had every vegetable they have there thrown in .  It was soooooooo tasty!!!!!!! I absolutely love this food!!!!!!! It kinda reminds me of eating breakfast and dinner at the same time . The inside is savory and the crepe is slightly sweet but not too much. The pricing is very fair also. It was about $9 a crepe and they are very filling . In fact I couldn't even finish it because I was so perfectly full. Anyways Tasty Crepes gets 2 thumbs up . Give it a try !
this place has an awesome selection of treats and crepes are very tasty. But the place smells weird other than that i enjoy my visits here.
Crape was very good. I ve been there twice and I will keep going there for sure. Fruits was fresh and tasty. I love this place a lot

Wanting something sweet after eating at home and on the way to a show, I decided to try this crêpe house that I had bookmarked for awhile.  I had read some of the reviews before going so I knew how to order.  The problem was finding the place.  Hidden from Fort Apache, the shop is behind the Roberto's Taco store and north of Taco Bell.

After being greeted warmly, I picked up the slip and marked the things I wanted for my crêpe.  I checked banana and blueberries topped with chocolate and Nutella with powdered sugar and cookies and cream ice cream.  I ordered it medium.  That's the only thing I'd do differently.  It was made medium but I would have preferred the soft texture more--my decision, my error!

In a short time, a young woman brought my dish and away I went.  It was a very enjoyable dessert.  Gee, I'm glad I had nothing sweet in the house.  

The staff was very nice.  As I was eating, a gentleman came around and checked on me and some others in the shop.  That was good customer service and care.

I think I need to return and try one of their savory crêpes.  That would be dinner,.

A very small/cramped place but they do deliver through Postmates so you don't have to eat there. 

The crepes are absolutely perfect! I usually get mine with mango, vanilla ice cream, and sweetened condensed milk but you can mix and match however you want. Their savory crepes are really yummy too. My favorite thing on their menu is their mango coconut rice. Usually only find this dish at Thai places, etc. but theirs is by far the best. They give you sooo much mango! All in all, I love this place.
We need to thank Yelp for steering us here. Best meal and best value for buck since we rolled into the Red Rock Casino and Spa. Well worth the commute here!
I had a great vegetarian savory crepe and my girl had a sweet one, they were both very good, just wish they had better ice cream than thrifty.
They have the best crepes in town. Place is really clean great customer service. Price is good for what you get. Feeling like a good crepe with Ice cream this is the place to stop and get your crepe.

Love this spot! First time going today and it definitely won't be my last! I tried the 6 pieces of frozen fruit with chocolate and different toppings which is a great bargain at $3.50. My favorite was the chocolate&peanuts covered banana, the dark chocolate mango, and the white chocolate pineapple. My boyfriend had the chocolate covered cheesecake which was amaze balls! Telling everyone I know about this hidden gem! Cute little dessert spot that doesn't break the bank!
This place Is great! I had weight loss surgery 3yrs ago and pizza is not my friend. Try their possess crepe it's amazing!

This place is a gem for crepe lovers like me !!! Their crepes are the best in town, no doubt there. The sizes are big too and easy to share for 2.

The place is so clean and the owners and staff are very friendly and welcoming.

Walked in and the first thing that hits you is the sweet smell of the crepe batter.  It's a warm comforting smell, can't really explain it.

The man that was helping/checking us out was very friendly.  Since we are new to all this foodie heaven paradise, he had to help us mark our order and give us a rundown of how to order on the papers provided.

The gentleman brought our food to the table, and the pizza crepe was HUUUUGE!  Much more bigger than I thought it would be.  I got peperoni/salami, cheese, pizza sauce and mushrooms. It was very TASTY indeed.  

The hubbs' was very good too.  Loved the contrast between cold ice cream and warm nutella.

We will be coming here again :)
I love this place. So fresh. Love the crapes. I come here a lot. It's a cute little family owned business.

Went here for the first time the other night and I had a really good experience. Very helpful staff with explaining to us about how we order and what's popular on their menu.

We didn't wait long for our order to come out to us. OH! And another plus for them serving it to us :) the portion of the crepes were huge! My friends got the desert ones and I got pretty jealous because it looked THAT good. I ended up getting one of their savory crepes. It was pretty good but I wish they added something a little more. Maybe like a sauce to go with it or something extra inside the crepe to make it amazing.
All in all, this place was awesome!

Me and my family came here again for lunch, the prices, the food, the smoothies, and service is awesome! 

The Crepes and mango smoothly, makes me return! If you haven't tried this place your missing out!!
They have sweet and savory awesome crepes.  Top notch service. Need to try their shakes and boba drinks.

Glad we found a quality crepe/dessert place that close by!

We met the owner and he and his wife are sweet as can be! They have a variety of items to choose from. You can have chocolate covered cheesecake, bananas, (anything it seems like!) smoothies (although I need to find out if they do green smoothies :) and of course crepes. Sweet or savory are your choices and it's a "build your own" system. 

We've been here a couple times and we've only had sweet crepes. Both times- banana, vanilla ice cream with whipped cream and caramel sauce. Yum-O.

My family loves this place! The owners are super friendly and the service is great. We've been going here for quite some time, enough for them to remember our order lol. I'm quite picky on some places to go; their customer service, price, and their servings are what makes us keep coming back here.

Of course I found this little slice of Heaven on Yelp! Went in about 25 mins to closing so it was quiet and a great time to meet the owners and talk. They take pride in their place and sell quality food. I got a custom crepe and all I can say is WOW, I'm in love! Fresh fruit, chocolate sauce & Nutella all wrapped in a fresh crepe! There fruit looks so good and the crepe dough has a unique and wonderful taste. I can't wait to try everything they offer. I'm a fan!!!

This is just a review of their savory foods. The menu offers three types, the savory, the deli, and the pizza crepe. Qualitatively, there is not too much difference because many of the ingredients overlap, replace the pepperoni in the pizza crepe with deli meat and you've got a deli crepe. They are generous with the amount of ingredients in the crepe and you can specify as many types as you wish. Think subway. We had a savory crepe and also tried a waffle sandwich. Both were very filling but soggy and underwhelming. Space is cute and staff is friendly. I will give their sweet crepes a try at some point and try to understand why they have a 5 star yelp rating.
I've been going to Tasty Crepes since they were at fantastic swap meet their crepes are really good and the kids love their chocolate covered bananas and cheeseckes.

I love this place so much. Their crepe is always a big portion and the workers are so nice and genuine. There  was one time when I knew they were closing in 5 minutes but when I called and asked to make me a last minute crepe, they did it for me. I was so happy. Thank you for the great food and amazing service!

My girlfriend and I were always looking for a good place to get crepes on the southwest side of town, and now that this place has come along, I think we have found one! The owners were really nice, and the crepes were delicious (we went with strawberry, whip cream, blueberries, and vanilla ice cream). It took about all of 5 minutes to scarf mine down, and I was definitely ready for 2nds.
The place was a little quiet--kinda like a library--which made me feel like we had to whisper at times. That's probably because it's new, but if they punched up the ambiance a little bit I'd raise it to a 5 star in a heart beat. Also, it'd be nice if you could add a few things to the side--maybe eggs if you're in the mood for breakfast, etc.
All in all, a place we will definitely come back to, and a place I'd recommend to come check out.
Fresh fruit. Quality ice cream and home made crepes, what's not to love?? Apologize to yourself if u don't go.

This is a great little crepe café. Interior is nice and colorful. Customer service is decent. They have a few tables and chairs if you decide to enjoy your crepe sitting in (which is the best way to go). They also offer teas, ice creams, and few other desserts, but I always go for the crepe. I love how customizable the crepes are; from the doneness of the crepe, to the toppings and fillings, you pick everything. I always prefer mango in my crepe, they always seem to have super sweet, delicious mangoes on hand. 
My dream custom crepe from here is medium Crunchy crepe, filled with mangoes, whipped cream, topped with Nutella and caramel, and of course, a scoop of good old vanilla ice cream, yum!
Last time i made a mistake of picking chocolate "sauce" instead of nutella, and it kinda threw off the flavor of the mangoes.
Overall, will definitely be returning when my next crepe craving hits! :)

Definitely a GO-TO for a simple crepe spot! Most crepe places have TOO much to choose from and they keep their menu simple and basic, but with all the favorites to be included. Plus the have fresh chocolate covered bananas which is a MUST. 

Philip and his wife are the owners and such a humble pair of mom-and-pop entrepreneurs!! This will definitely be one of our favorite places to have a great dessert on any given day!

I am a dessert lover, and although there isn't anything out of the ordinary or extra special about this particular, little crepe cafe, the crepes are delicious and so are the frozen bananas! It's bright and colorful inside, and the owner is always happy to greet us every time. There are also other frozen treats that you can happily indulge in (frozen bananas, frozen cheesecake, etc.)

I definitely think this place deserves a little more attention than it gets! But that's understandable considering there are a lot of dessert spots around this area, those of which also serve Thrifty's ice cream. Whenever I order crepes here, I finish it in less than two minutes. It's the combination of ice cream, the multiple choices of fruit and sauces, the convenience of the location (for me), and the great service that deserves 4 stars.
My husband and I stopped in to try it . OMG I was so impressed with the staff and the friendly inviting atmosphere. The food is fresh and really good quality Would recommend this place to everyone!

Amazing customer service! Very kind and friendly! A little expensive for crepes ($18 for 2) but it's really tasty! You get choices for everything on the crepe including how done you want your crepe. Will definitely be coming back.

This place has been open approximately two weeks, so it's time that someone reviewed it.

I came here for the first time today after lunch at Roberto's because my coworkers recommended it. I decided to have a light lunch, leaving room for what I was hoping would be a delicious crepe. For a place called Tasty Crepes, there aren't many crepe choices. While you have various fruit choices and ice cream flavors, they're all basically dessert crepes. No lunch or dinner crepes.

The crepe wasn't bad. The serving size was large and is big enough to be shared. They use Thrifty ice cream, so the ice cream was good. Next time I'll probably just get an ice cream cone rather than the crepe.
Used to come here FAITHFULLY when I lived here and couldn't wait to return while visiting.... All to drive 41 minutes and they be closed for the holiday weekend. #SoDisappointed

I was nearby getting my eyebrows done and the owner suggested trying boba from tasty crepes. I will admit that I didn't try a crepe here but I ordered 4 boba teas and a mango sticky rice  which came out to $32. Sort of pricey. The worst part was the boba. I live for boba and I like to try it everywhere and this was the worst boba I have ever had. 

I started to sip my tea which had a decent flavor and then I sucked up a boba. The boba was pure mush. There was no chewiness at all. It was so bad that after my sister agreed, we went back in the store and told them that the boba was mushy and asked if they had issues making their batch of boba. The female employee first said "well we have other boba but it would be too chewy and hard." Who says that? Boba is supposed to be chewy. 

Well, then the owner came out and kindly said he would replace the boba in our drinks. He took our same drinks and poured them over the "new" batch of boba. Then he returned our drinks and stated "sorry we were trying to use up the rest of the old boba before we took out the fresh boba. We probably shouldn't have used it"

So if you want leftover boba and then to be told that boba isn't supposed to be chewy, then go here. Otherwise, STAY Away. I'm not even willing to try a crepe based on my experience. I would actually give no stars for knowingly giving their customers "old" boba! At least he replaced it...

This place has become one of my favorite places to eat! The crepes are delicious and made to order. You have so many different options to choose from so you're sure to find one that you fall in love with. My personal favorite- the savory crepe: Ham, onion, spinach, mozzarella cheese, and we always add egg! The staff is always friendly and we are greeted as soon as we walk in the door.
