The service is great and the food is brought right to our table. The crepe portion is pretty big and I usually share with my boyfriend. If you're looking for something other than the usual fast food restaurant, stop here. It's delicious, clean, and perfect for if you're on a budget.

Calm setting, great place to get an amazing desert I recommend this place to all my friends. Staff is extremely friendly and helpful with suggesting items if it's your first time in. My personal favorite is creating custom crapes.

Huge crepes! Fresh made and fresh fruit. There are too many combinations to list. They also have sandwich and pizza crepes but we came for desert only. Owners were on site and friendly and helpful in showing us the options. Really worth the drive!!

Tasty Crepes? It's definitely tasty!! I've been here a couple of times with my family and it's my favorite to-go place when we're craving for some sweets. The crepes here are delicious, they never disappoint. But I have to warn you, the portion is rather large. Other than that, I love how they have thrifty ice cream here. Chocolate malted crunch is my favorite. The owners here are really sweet. Will be back soon!

Yummy sweet crepes with quality toppings! No fake whipped cream or underripe fruit, here. I love that you can choose if you want your crepe soft, medium or crispy. I like a soft crepe loaded with deliciousness. These are big and hearty and hit my sweet tooth on the dot.

I was craving crêpes and forced my dear husband to try out this place. He tried a deli crêpes while I had a savory crêpes. Both are 8.95$ and you can stuff them with turkey, ham, and a bunch of vegetable and cheese options. My husband said he should have gone for the fruity ones but I enjoyed mine. There are a few more crêpes places around town but this one was our first to try and didn't disappoint. At least not me. :)
These crepes are delicious! I have been to many crepe places, but this one has been the best. I have only tried the sweet ones, but i bet the savory are fantastic as well!
Great spot. Clean, polite, affordable: First time visiting. Awesome strawberry-banana-Nutella crepe!  I will be back

This a an amazing place for a dessert. Talk about sweet tooth! Lol this place is amazing. They have a great staff and very hospitable and friendly. This a place to be if you are craving for something sweet. They also have Deli Crepes and Pizza Crepes. Also these people are hard working workers. Kudo points for them. Keep up the great work guys.

This place is pretty cool cuz not only does it offer dessert, but it offers regular crepes too... sandwich crepes and pizza crepes.  The portions are big and it's about $7-$9 a crepe.  I got the dessert crepe with strawberries & mango ( you can pick 3 fruits) vanilla ice cream (thrifty brand), whipped cream and chocolate sauce.  It was AMAZING!  My friends got a sandwich (turkey, spinach, avacado and cheese) and a pizza (pepperoni, mushrooms & cheese)  and they said it was awesome.  The owners were very helpful and explained how things work and all the goodies that they sell.  We will all be back for more.  :)
They also have chocolate dipped bananas, mango and pineapple chunks.  I will try that the next time I'm there.  They also have a stamp card.. buy 10 get the next one free!  I love that! ha. 

You guys should definitely try this place out.  ONE crepe can easily feed two people!  But i was a fatty and ate all of my crepe by myself! LOL.
Hands down the best crepes in Vegas!!! I am obsessed with this place. Everything is so fresh and taste amazing every time never fails. Highly recommend!
Amazing! This place is a hidden gem. Not just for desert but if that's what your looking for its truly amazing. Great service as well.

After a day spent shopping with the kids, I decided to take them out for a treat. Ohhh who am I kidding it was mostly because I've been wanting to try this place out hahaha. The place was minimal but very clean, service was very prompt and friendly. So I got the sticky rice with mangoes for me (it was delicious! I wish I had asked for more coconut sauce on the side though) A strawberry and banana with nutella crepe for my daughter and a root beer float for my son (this one I'm kinda iffy about, it's $5.00 for a regular sized float with nothing but just that)

Last night we went back for some more sticky rice and mangoes but sadly we were informed that mango season is over and that they wont be offering that anymore. BOOOO! Oh well until next year then, but we will certainly be back to try their other goodies.

This spot is a family own place. & I have nothing but great experiences every time I go here & I always get the Nutella & banana Crepes & it gets better every time I try it. This place is addicting & it's affordable compare to every other Crepe Place is town. The owners are awesome, they are funny, they care about the reviews, feedback & what we have to say. They make it just like what's on the pictures believe it or not. Everyone must try this place for some delicious Crepes.

The place is clean, Good fresh fruit and food. The crepes are loaded! (You will be full if not stuffed)The owner is extremely nice. The owner even let me make my own crepe! She is all about the customer we liked it so much we even dropped a $10 tip! This place is great and and is well deserving 5 stars!

What a great desert place that serves ice cream with fresh fruits inside a delicious crepe. This place also have fresh waffles and all kinds of frozen chocolate dipped fruits. Ohhh, don't forget to try their Mango/Sticky Rice...The people are really nice which makes the place that much more special. Must check it out.

Located in the back corner of a strip mall hunting down this little gem was worth the wait. 
Walking into the place to our surprise there was no one in the place. 
Three of us order two different crepes to share with combinations of banana, strawberries, hot chocolate and caramel. How could you go wrong and a great way to wrap up a night with an awesome plate of sweetness!

Came in here today on a crepe craving with a girlfriend. 
They sell frozen treats, such as dipped bananas, ice cream, and more.
Super clean place and guy who helped out was really friendly and accommodating. 
We ordered a Rocky Road crepe with kiwi and strawberries and a savory crepe with mozzarella, Ham, mushrooms, onions, spinach, and avocado. I wish they carried some ranch but they gave us ketchup and mustard. The crepes were the biggest I've ever ordered so definitely worth the bang for the buck!
Five stars for service, taste, quality!
The best crepes you can get! You just check your order on a slip of paper and hand it to the cashier! Highly recommend if you're craving for something sweet! And they also have savory!!!

Amazing crepes for such a cheap price. Don't hesitate to splurge your heart out who toppings and such. The lady is super sweet and she clearly abides by all the food safety rules. Great place to eat and catch up with your friends :)
First informal one of the best costumer service I had ever got the ladies that work there are very friendly. Also there food there is amazing
For me its either a hit or miss when it comes to finding a place that has yummy crepes but this place is a hit ! Staff is friendly Crepes are delicious!!
Husband and wife owned. Always great service, ice cream is great, cheesecake good and try out any of the chocolate dipped items.

What a wonderful place. The crepes are delicious. The best thing about this place is the freshness of the crepes.  They use all fresh ingredients. We have been here twice in two days and will be back. The service is excellent.

Great place for crepes. Staff is nice and the ordering service is easy. This is the place to really customize your crepes and it tastes awesome. The fruits also taste very fresh. Will definitely come back whenever we want crepes!

We have been coming to this place for a few years now and still the same great place and exceptional customer service. If you love crepes and smothies, this is the place to be.  Don't waste your money on those fake smothies that they use powder as flavors.

Thin crepe cooked evenly, slightly sweet batter. Spread on some nutella scoop of rocky road ice cream, now add some strawberries, blueberries, and banana's. next comes some chocolate sauce drizzled on top, whip cream and a cherry.  Now that's a tasty crepe! 

Very good, generous portion, friendly staff.

Wow....yummy!!!
Had a crepe - strawberries, blueberries, Nutella, vanilla ice cream with whip. This was only $7.25! The crepe was a really good size and the taste was fresh! The crepe coulda been a little bit
More done but it was good nonetheless! We will be back!
Fast service, big portions, clean restaurant. Great place and will definitely be back ASAP.
Staff are Very friendly and helpful and the restaurant is clean. Delicious crepes with fresh fruits with many options to pick from. Large enough for 2 people.

The banana and Nutella with chocolate drizzle crepe I had was very tasty but really made this place great is the owners. They were the sweetest couple and really made the place feel relaxing. After a long summer's day, this is the kind of place you want to come and enjoy a cool treat.

Fresh fruit, ice cream, nutella, crepes.  Now that I have your attention, that is just one of the many crepes you can create here. with multiple ingredients, sauces, and mix ins, you can really have some tasty savory crepes.  The portion size is large and filling and the owners very friendly.  If sweet isn't your thing, try the savory pizza crepes, deli crepes and more. Or try the chocolate banana bites (pineapple and mango too).
Awesome place for a dessert. Food and service were both great. Won't be my last time going.

After a dinner of Mexican fare across the street, the b/f and I wanted dessert.  Our handy Yelp app directed us to this bookmark that I had forgotten about.  A cute, clean place, Tasty Crepes offers sweet and savory crepes, as well as Thrifty Ice Cream, sundaes, boba, and, score, frozen bananas - I love frozen bananas!  Not only do they have frozen bananas, but they have chocolate-covered frozen mangoes, pineapples, and cheesecake, too.  I have never encountered a place that sells frozen banana bites.  Tasty Crepes lets you have six for $3.50 and you can select from plain chocolate, chocolate with nuts, sprinkles, M&Ms, or coconut.  See my pic for my assortment.  It was just the right amount to satisfy my dessert jones for the evening.  We'll have to come back and actually try one of the crepes next time, but I have a feeling the frozen bananas will be calling my name, too.

Called this place on a Labor Day asking if they're still open. The guy was nice enough to keep it open until 9pm and wait for us Becuase they were suppose to close early which I are really appreciate his service for doing that. Came in and ordered the crepe with ice cream. The portion was way beyond expected and a lot. Suggested in getting the Malt crunch ice cream with your crepe. 

I then ordered the Thai Green tea, very floral taste and not watered down. We also ordered some chocolate covered fruits was priced 6 pieces for $3.50 of your choice. 

This place satisfied my late night cravings and will come back again since it's by my house.

My husband is LEGIT OBSESSED with the pizza crepes from Tasty Crepes. We live a good half hour drive from this place, but we go here so that my husband can get his fix, as we do gluten free 99% of the time, which means no pizza. This is the perfect fix if you're dying for a piece of pizza but can't eat bread. It's huge and is split into two for sharing. They will even modify the to-go box to make sure your crepes don't get soggy on the drive home.

Dessert crepes are great, but let's be honest, it's hard to mess up Nutella + ANYTHING. 

Prices are great and the portions are more than generous. Also, check out their chocolate covered fruit. The banana bites are fantastic. My husband can't wait to try the dipped cheesecake on a stick.
Taro smoothies and avocado smoothies! YUMM!! They don't add fillers, I made sure to ask. Their thai iced coffee is good too.
This place is exactly what the name says. It is full of tasty crepes. From sweet to savory. Ordered the strawberry and banana sweet crepe and can't wait to try a savory one next!

Huge crepes. Everything is good. Served with delicious Thrifty ice cream. Fruit is fresh or they dont serve it. Pick up a slip to custom order your crepe. My favorite is strawberry banana with nutella chocolate whipped cream powdered sugar. Vanilla or strawberry ice cream on yhe side. Mmmmmm.

I Love this place!! Fresh made crepes, and they are Very generous with everything. They cut the fruit right in front of u so you see how fresh they are. They also make DELI CREPES! And They are to Die for. Not to mention the amazingly friendly staff. This Place needs 10 stars. You must try this place if you are craving Anything sweet. Ice Cream, Frozen Fruit, Crepes, Food, they've got it all!! :)

Another hot July day, it's time to find a place to cool off. Tasty Crepes offers just the prescription to chill out. The clean, pastel painted environment is calming upon entry. A very welcoming duo greeted us at the counter. My son opted for traditional vanilla scooped ice cream and the kind team accommodated his whim by adding rainbow sprinkles. My daughter splurged with cotton candy Thrifty ice cream in a bowl with chunks of sliced, frozen chocolate dipped bananas. Make a note, chocolate dipped pineapple and mango chunks are also available. For me, I relished a traditional Thai Iced Tea. When out and about for events at Star Nursery Kids Garden Club, Water Wings Swim School, Kids Kingdom or another kid-friendly day in Las Vegas, keep Tasty Crepes in mind for a break in the day.

Stopped in late Sunday evening to try something new. I knew I wanted a savory crepe and told them it was my first time. The gentleman  (owner?) Didn't get his name but he showed me the ordering slips and helped place my order. It's 40 degrees outside but ever since I saw this place I've been craving chocolate covered fruit so I knew I wanted to try them. You can order any six of the small chocolate banana,mango or pineapple pieces for like 4.00 so worth it! I took mine to go and they were thoughtful to poke holes in the box so it wouldn't be too soggy. The crepe was so much bigger than what I anticipated so I'm really glad I didn't order a sweet crepe too because it would have been too much. I can assume it's probably best to eat these right away but it was still warm and the crepe tasted really good.I want to go back soon and try a sweet crepe!

I had this place bookmarked because I love crepes. I was down in this neighborhood and hungry soooo it was time to stop by and try it.

It wasn't quite what I was expecting because its more of a ice cream parlor style place than a restaurant style place. Only about 6 tables inside. 

Since I stopped at 11 am, I was the first and only customer as this place opens at 11 and goes to 10pm. The lady working there was very nice and friendly. 

I ordered the mixed berry fruit crepe with whipped cream. It was good sized and full of fresh fruit. They mixed the whipped cream inside the crepe so it had a little bit in each savory bite. 

I will come back and try it again.

To keep it short go for the crepes! I can't believe how good their crepes are!! Be patient though because there's only one worker making the dessert! Now stay away from the chocolate dipped stuff. It looks good but they use cheap chocolate. Overall I'd go back!!

They keep things simple. 

Crepes: made to order with fresh fruits, as many sauces and toppings you want, and a gigantic scoop of good quality ice cream for only a dollar more. Portion sizes are more than generous as well. 

They also have a good assortment of chocolate dipped frozen mango, pineapple, cheesecake, and banana. You have the option of bites or on a stick, with nuts, sprinkles, or coconut shavings, etc., etc! 

Other places could use a tip from them when it comes to top-notch customer service. The owners are very accommodating and welcoming. They help you through the ordering process and are super patient! This place screams QUALITY DESSERTS and SERVICE at you! Five stars, well-earned.
I am so addicted to the fruit crepes. The best Nutella strawberry banana crepes and really decently priced. Cute place to eat at. Everything is freshly/hand made.

One of my new favorite crepe places in town. It was really really delicious. I had both savory & fruit crepe. They were huge and tasty! They both tasted fresh , fruits were fresh and delicious! Will definitely be returning :)

This place exceeded my expectations! The crepes are, just as stated, tasty! And HUGE too! The store is cute, nice size, a few tables  and lounge couches and you have the option of eating there or taking to go. We chose to stay and indulge in a crepe. They give you the option for 3 toppings with or without ice cream. Ordering is super easy because they already set up a tiny paper that you can decide on what you would like from Nutella to chocolate to all the fruits and ice cream! Being such an indecisive person, it was so hard to decide! I chose a Nutella, banana, strawberry, with whipped cream, chocolate syrup, and chocolate malted crunch ice cream. YUM. The crepe was made perfectly, soft and chewy, with a hint of crunchiness at some parts. I also couldn't help myself, but we grabbed a couple chocolate dipped fruits, which were delish and reasonably priced. It comes with 6, and I chose to get banana, pineapple, and mango. Mmm mmm, good. My boyfriend's little brother chose 2 scoops of chocolate ice cream, and I got one scoop of rainbow sherbet. Thrifty's ice cream is always the way to go! They sell boba and other deliciously looking crepes which I will definitely need to try in the future! The lady who served us was really nice and friendly which is always an added plus. She gave us a punch card, and if you're someone like me who collects these from the best places, then this is an added plus!! If you're looking for a quick dessert stop with good prices and wanting to walk out like you're full and satisfied, tasty crepes is definitely the place to go! Pretty happy with this being my first review. :) 5 stars for SURE!

I seriously love this place. I love the staff and the food. I've been coming here since it first opened with my mom and I've became a regular. Phil and his wife are just amazing ! 
This is the type of place that when you and your friends don't know where to go , you come here. I know for a fact I've brought all my friends here , even visitors from out of state ! So if I could I'd give this 10 stars

With my friend and in need of a sweet to top off our foodventure for the day, we wandered into Tasty Crepes. 

When we walked in they were pretty empty, but in less than five minutes the place was packed. Good timing on our parts.

When you approach the counter there are small order forms where you mark all the contents you want included in your crepe. They have sweet, savory and pizza crepes to choose from. I opted for a sweet version with strawberries, mixed berries, chocolate brownie ice cream and powdered sugar. My OG ordered a sweet with chocolate chip ice cream, berries and strawberry sauce as well as a pizza crepe with pepperoni and sausage I believe. They serve Thrifty's ice cream, so that's a nice blast from my past growing up in Southern California.

We took a seat and waited for our creations to be brought out to us. The crepes were good and I enjoyed the the filling quite a bit. The crepe itself was a little on the dryer, burnt side and didn't have the lovely softer texture that I have come to love. 

The crepes are a lot bigger than I was expecting and we realized we were in over our heads with three crepes total. My friend ended up taking a majority of his pizza crepe home with him as leftovers. I didn't follow up with him to see how it held up, but I didn't expect it to. 

The crepes were decent and it's a nice spot to grab a dessert and just chat with friends since they have a decent sized dining area with chairs and tables. Portions are large and decently priced for what you're getting so sharing might be a good idea if you're not super hungry.

The owners are extremely friendly and nice. They explain everything and answer all questions. Their crepes are delicious. As I was eating, they offered a free sample of their chocolate covered bananas. Definitely a place worth going to for sweets.

My mother and I were looking for a new crepe place to eat at.... We've finally found the new best place to eat crepes. The fruits are so fresh and sweet. They're not stingy with their items; they pile the fruits, ice cream, and sauce. The crepes were delicious; crisp edges with sweetness from the fruits. I would highly recommend this place.
